headline: INTELLIGENT ACTUATOR INC. DS-SERIES
description: XY Pair of DS-S5H-100 Ballscrew Actuators, With (2) DS-S-C1 Controllers.    A compact, programmable, electromechanical  alternative to air cylinders (representative photo).
specstable:
Manufacturer Intelligent Actuator
Model DSS5H100
Configuration X-Y
Mechanical Drive System Ballscrew
Encoder Included YES
Maximum Travel Speed 31.500 in/s (800 mm/s)
Motor Drive: Servo Motor Size: 20W
Other Information DS-S5H-100 Actuator ("Slider" type)
  • Multiple positioning
  • Acceleration/deceleration programmability
  • Speed setting programmability
  • Programmable control
  • Motor: 20W AC servo w/ incremental optical encoder
  • Maximum stroke: 100mm (4")
  • Maximum horizontal payload: 17.6 lbs
  • Repeatability: +/- 0.02mm
    DS-S-C1 Controller
  • Memory device: CMOS RAM
  • Number of programs/steps/positions: 32/1000/500
  • User inputs/outputs: 15/6
  • Built-in RS232C and brake release unit
